A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It's like the writers didn't know what to do with Finn and Poe's storyline while they attempted to develop the Luke Ren and Rey main plot. So they wrote a list of things they thought the audience wanted to see (lightsaber duel with Rey and Ren fighting together\, Chewy saving the Day in the millinium falcon\, blue milk\, Poe learning a lesson about leadership\, a cool rebel ring to sell\, Finn fighting Brianne of Tarth and lots of others.)\nAnd then tried (and failed) to make up a logical plot that tied it all together. \nToo many illogical solutions to storyline problems. Didn't think it could get worse than the force awakens\, but definitely wrong. Ruining Star Wars.
